query: SELECT name, image_url, price, color, details_intro, details_bullets, material, composition_parts, made_in, sustainable_detail, url FROM app_product WHERE LOWER(details_intro) LIKE LOWER('%wedding%') OR LOWER(details_bullets) LIKE LOWER('%wedding%') OR LOWER(category) LIKE LOWER('%dress%') OR LOWER(category) LIKE LOWER('%suit%') ORDER BY (price IS NULL), price LIMIT 50
sustainable_detail: 51,18 liters of water used / 95% % of liters saved | 4,16 kg CO2 eq used / 48% % of kg CO2 eq saved | 32 people behind with safe work & better livelihoods | + 21 processes from design to sale in a product ethically traded | 13.560 km behind committed to sustainability | B Corp B Corp certification guarantees and product supply chain traceability
reason_selected: Water and emission savings, certified supply chain
